thread.title: Volkswagen to name VW brand chief to replace CEO - sources

title: Volkswagen to name VW brand chief to replace CEO - sources
text:
Volkswagen to name VW brand chief to replace CEO - sources 12:14pm EDT - 01:06 
Volkswagen is seeking to replace Chief Executive Matthias Mueller with the head of its core brand, Herbert Diess, as part of a broader overhaul of its management structure to boost efficiency, two people familiar with the matter said. Sonia Legg reports
